com.rultor.web

Class ConstraintsMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rexsl.page.BaseResource
      • com.rultor.web.ConstraintsMapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Resource, ExceptionMapper<ConstraintViolationException>

    @Provider
@Loggable(value=1)
public final class ConstraintsMapper
extends BaseResource
implements ExceptionMapper<ConstraintViolationException>
    Maps constraint violations to JAX-RS responses.

    The class is mutable and NOT thread-safe.

    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Yegor Bugayenko (yegor@tpc.com)
